title: Riot Support Site
body:
I get this every time that I try to login in to even write a message to your support and it's kinda upsetting. I changed my name today and was unable to get the name that I wanted, I'm fairly certain it's because one of the words contains (Cha)riot, in it, pls help rito support.

Name I want is: Chariot Du Nord
Name that I have right now is: Ursula Callistis

{{champion:8}} Be Negative, You'll be Just My Type

replies.body: Try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to get around that weird error, but if that doesn't help go ahead and try using a different browser or a private/incognito window. If that's still not working, feel free to shoot us a ticket by emailing us at support@riotgames.com!
